local_intent: Lower the gripper slowly until table contact at the place spot, after aligning, and verify contact.
assumptions: Red bottle is currently held in the gripper.
The place_on_table target corresponds to a reachable, clear area on the tabletop.
coherence_with_global: Implements the LowerUntilContact step with the same parameters, preceded by alignment and followed by contact verification, consistent with the global placement sequence.
